Description:
In this area, a major battle between the pirates and the army had taken place, but it seems that the location now serves a different purpose: as training grounds. 

Some soldiers in navy uniforms are present, and they appear to be sparring with each other using brooms instead of weapons. 

When they notice your approach, they ask if you would like to join them in their sparring match.
